contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox anthem |title = Državna himna Bosne i Hercegovine{{-}}Државна химна Босне и Херцеговине |transcription = |english_title = National Anthem of Bosnia and Herzegovina |alt_title = Intermeco |en_alt_title = |alt_title_2 = |en_alt_title_2 = |image = Flag of Bosnia and Herzegovina.svg |image_size = |alt = |caption = |prefix = National |country = {{flag|Bosnia and Herzegovina}} |author = |lyrics_date = |composer = [[Dušan Šestić]] |music_date = |adopted = 10 February 1998 |until = |sound = |sound_title = }} '''Državna himna Bosne i Hercegovine''' ([[Serbian Cyrillic]]: ''Државна химна Босне и Херцеговине'', ''National Anthem of Bosnia and Herzegovina'') is the [[national anthem]] of [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]]. It is one of the two national anthems (along with that of [[Marcha Real|Spain]]) in the world to have no official lyrics.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://nationalanthems.me/spain-marcha-real/ | title=Spain - Marcha Real | publisher=NationalAnthems.me | accessdate=2011-11-23 }}</ref> The anthem was adopted on 25 June 1999, by the promulgation of the Law on the National Anthem of Bosnia and Herzegovina,<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ohr.int/decisions/statemattersdec/default.asp?content_id=354 |title=Decision imposing the Law on the National Anthem of BiH |author=Office of the High Representative |date=25 June 1999 |accessdate=10 May 2010}}</ref> replacing the previous anthem, "[[Jedna si jedina]]", which apparently excluded the country's [[Serb]] and [[Croat]] communities, though, was in use from February 10, 1998, as the [[Flag of Bosnia and Herzegovina|flag]] and [[Coat of arms of Bosnia and Herzegovina|coat of arms]]. [[Bosnian Serb]] from [[Banja Luka]], [[Dušan Šestić]] composed the melody, to which initially there were no lyrics under the working title '''Intermeco''', which is commonly referred to as the title of the anthem. Lyrics written by Dušan Šestić, the original composer, and Benjamin Isović were accepted by a parliamentary commission in February 2009.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.mpr.gov.ba/bs/str.asp?id=375 |title=Proposal of the Text for the National Hymn of BiH Adopted by the Council of Ministers of BiH |author=Ministry of Justice of Bosnia and Herzegovina |date=4 June 2010 |accessdate=10 May 2010}}</ref> The decision still requires approval of the [[Council of Ministers of Bosnia and Herzegovina]] and the [[Parliamentary Assembly of Bosnia and Herzegovina]] and the [[House of Peoples of Bosnia and Herzegovina]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.balkaninsight.com/en/article/bosnia-anthem-gets-lyrics-after-10-years|title=Bosnia Anthem Gets Lyrics After 10 Years |author=Balkan Insight |date=23 February 2010 |accessdate=10 May 2010}}</ref> The lyrics do not mention the two administrative entities or the constitutional nations that make up the state, and end with the line "We are going into the future, together!". ==Lyrics== ===Bosnian Lyrics=== :Ti si svjetlost duše :Vječne vatre plam :Majko naša zemljo, Bosno :Tebi pripadam :U srcu su tvoje :Rijeke, planine :Plavo more :Bosne i Hercegovine :Ponosna i slavna :Zemljo predaka :Živjet ćeš u srcu našem :Dov'jeka :Pokoljenja tvoja :Kazuju jedno: :Mi idemo u budućnost :Zajedno! ===English Translation=== :You're the light of the soul :Eternal fire's flame :Mother of ours, land of Bosnia :I belong to you :In the heart are yours :Rivers, mountains :Blue sea :Of Bosnia and Herzegovina :Proud and famous :Land of ancestors :You shall live in our hearts :Ever more :Generations of yours :Show up one: :We go into the future :Together! ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * The [http://www.vijeceministara.gov.ba/osnovne_informacije_o_bih/?id=7309 Bosnia and Herzegovina, Council of Ministers] have a page about the national symbols, including an instrumental file. * [http://www.sarajevo-x.com/clanak/090220055 Himna BiH napokon dobila tekst] - The website [http://www.sarajevo-x.com "Sarajevo-x"] features a page on the anthem's lyrics, including a vocal version. * [http://nationalanthems.me/bosnia-and-herzegovina-drzavna-himna-bosne-i-hercegovine/ Bosnia and Herzegovina: ''Državna himna Bosne i Hercegovine'' - Audio of the national anthem of Bosnia and Herzegovina, with information and lyrics] {{Nationalanthemsofeurope}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Drzavna Himna Bosne I Hercegovine}} [[Category:National anthems]] [[Category:National symbols of Bosnia and Herzegovina]] [[Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina music]] {{BosniaHerzegovina-stub}}
